title: Folding Fork, ca. 1790
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has three straight tines, rounded shoulders, flaring neck. Handle has straight sides with rounded ends. Silver scales engraved with floral decoration and gilded details, three rivets. Fork folds partly into blade.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Folding Fork, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. silver, gold. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-266.
